column4: I'm trying to install a ftp server (vsftp) and I can connect through filezilla successfully, but the second I add ssl support, I only get ECONNREFUSED thrown in my face... what could be wrong?
there could be a firewall between it, that recognizes an unencrypted ftp-port statement, but is (of course) not able to recognize it, when it is ssl-encrypted.
is there a NAT between client and server?
